title: Space Center & Kemah Guide
subtitle: Explore NASA's Johnson Space Center and the Kemah Boardwalk

overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: Two of Houston's most popular attractions
overview.description: Space Center Houston and Kemah Boardwalk are two of the most popular attractions in the Houston area, located near each other along the Gulf Coast. Space Center Houston offers an educational experience about NASA and space exploration, while Kemah Boardwalk provides entertainment, dining, and amusement rides on the waterfront. This guide will help you plan your visit to these attractions during the FIRST Championship.

itineraries.title: Suggested Itineraries
itineraries.description: Here are some suggested itineraries to help you plan your visit to Space Center Houston and Kemah Boardwalk. Choose the one that best fits your interests and available time.

fullDay.title: Full Day Space & Boardwalk Adventure
schedule: 10:00 AM - Arrive at Space Center Houston
1:00 PM - Explore Independence Plaza and Starship Gallery
7:30 PM - Evening stroll along the boardwalk

spaceCenterFocus.title: Space Center Focus Day
schedule: 10:30 AM - Arrive at Space Center Houston
3:30 PM - Mission Mars and ISS Gallery
